No Mercy (previously titled King Uncaged) is the upcoming seventh studio album 
by American rapper T.I. The album is scheduled to be released on December 7, 2010..

if anyones wondering how to check true bitrate of a mp3 u download on the net, for future use :


EncSpot 2
From GuerillaSoft:
EncSpot is a freeware application that will guess which encoder your mp3 files were encoded with as well as displaying other information. It also reports on the files' quality and displays a bitrate histogram for VBR files. It uses a familiar Explorer user interface.

its on the cnet downloads section, quite handy , cuz winamp jus dispays the bitrate tag, which will show this release as 320k but when u find the true bitrate for comparing it, will show 192k, as is in the h3x release, not complaining at all, but like the others said noFS does this for all there releases, which i dont mind if u state it ahead of time, bc peoples download bandwith  can be expensive, but instead u say if u dont like it dont download it, how about not misleading people. upscaling does nothing for the quality.
